name: DevOps - Payments
description:
Corporate Banking is a technology centric business, with an increasing move to real-time processing, an increasing appetite from customers for integrated systems and access to supporting data.

Payments & Cheques provide the technology for payments, one of the most fundamental and critical capabilities of the Corporate Bank’s Cash Management business. Our platforms sit at the heart of Deutsche Bank and our business partners and clients rightly have the highest expectations for transformative delivery and innovative solutions, with a continuous focus on scalability, resilience and regulatory compliance. We support the full range of payment types, clearing systems and client types across the globe, from bulk low-value payments made by corporate clients, to 24x7 instant payments made by retail clients, to individual high-value payments made by financial institutions. Our change programmes and solutions ensure the DB Cash Management business keeps its position at the forefront of this dynamic and highly competitive market.

As part of our global team you will work on global platform supporting payments processing as a System Engineer. You will work closely with developers to deliver best operation experience for application. You are expected to master firm’s ecosystem of infrastructure management (including both in-house and industry tools) and contribute to the vision and architecture to deliver best operational experience for platform.

Skills You’ll Need

  • Previous experience in comparable: 3+ years
  • Good knowledge of Lunix and networking
  • Experience with modern DevOps tools such as Anisble, Salt, Puppet, Chef
  • Experience with modern monitoring tools such as Prometheus, Influx, Grafana
  • Flexibility to quickly learn and master in-house tools and processes related to infrastructure related procedure
  • Basic knowledge of SQL
  • Intermediate or higher English skills

Will be a plus:

  • Deep expertise with Ansible
  • Hands-on experience with Kubernetes / OpenShift, Helm
  • Hands-on experience with Apache Kafka, Apache Zookeeper
  • Hands-on experience with Jenkins/TeamCity
  • Good understanding on network protocol stack TPC, HTTP, TLS
  • Experience with modern SDLC tools - Git, JIRA, Artifactory

Success Factors for Engineers in CB Tech

  • Someone who sets the standard for excellence in their role as an engineer
  • Talented individuals who are creative, innovative, and passionate about doing exciting and important work and a strong desire to make an impact
  • People who make wise decisions, despite ambiguity, be it people, technical, business or creative
  • Engineers who consider quality as a priority, and think about the client whilst developing for our future
  • Curious individuals who seek to understand our strategy, our business, the market and our clients
  • People who challenge assumptions when warranted and make suggestions for better approaches
  • Individuals who have a desire of self-improvement through experience, observation, introspection, reading and discussion
  • People who treat others with respect at all times, independent of their status or role in the organization

What we offer

  • Flexible working hours
  • Partially remote work
  • Comfortable office located in the city center
  • Extended insurance package: medical and life insurance + partial coverage for spouse and children
  • Plenty of professional learning opportunities: English courses, professional trainings and certification, conferences participation
  • Relocation package (for new-joiners from other locations)
